mapper.insert: insert into farm ( fm_id, fm_title, size, province, city, detailed_address, pos_lng, pos_lat, contact_name, contact_phone, key_vegetable, fm_introduce, business_begin, create_time ) values ( #{farm.fmId}, #{farm.fmTitle}, #{farm.size}, #{farm.province}, #{farm.city}, #{farm.detailedAddress}, #{farm.posLng}, #{farm.posLat}, #{farm.contactName}, #{farm.contactPhone}, #{farm.keyVegetable}, #{farm.fmIntroduce}, #{farm.businessBegin}, #{farm.createTime} )
mapper.update: update farm set fm_title = #{farm.fmTitle}, size = #{farm.size}, contact_name = #{farm.contactName}, contact_phone = #{farm.contactPhone}, key_vegetable = #{farm.keyVegetable}, fm_introduce = #{farm.fmIntroduce}, business_begin = #{farm.businessBegin}, spec = #{farm.spec} where id = #{farm.id}
update farm set check_status = #{code} where id = #{id}
update farm set fm_img = #{fmImg} where id = #{id}
mapper.select: select id, fm_id, fm_title, consumer_num, cus_distance_baidu(pos_lat, pos_lng, #{lat}, #{lng}) as distance, fm_img, spec from farm where check_status = 1 order by distance asc limit 15
